      • buildMCRewardsFromPrismExplicit

        public MCRewards buildMCRewardsFromPrismExplicit(DTMC mc,
                                                 java.io.File rews,
                                                 java.io.File rewt)
                                          throws PrismException
        Construct the rewards for a Markov chain (DTMC or CTMC) from files exported explicitly by PRISM.
        Parameters:
        mc - The DTMC or CTMC
        rews - The file containing state rewards (ignored if null)
        rewt - The file containing transition rewards (ignored if null)
        Throws:
        PrismException
